XI.ii.3.E.11.a
.
Accrued Benefits Used to Reimburse
Accrued benefits may be used to reimburse a person or person(s) who paid the expenses of the last illness and/or burial of a beneficiary, but only if there is no one in a permitted class entitled to the accrued benefit on the basis of relationship.
Note
:  The amount of accrued payable as reimbursement is restricted to the actual amount of expenses paid.
Reference
:  For more information on entitlement to accrued benefits on the basis of relationship, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.A.5
.
